oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Meridian Street Methodist Church, (Ray of Hope Community Church)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Meridian Street Methodist Church was organized in 1924 with the consolidation of two churches, McFerrin Memorial, located on Meridian Street in North Edgefield, and Alex Erwin Church located where Douglas Ave. intersects Dickerson Road. The cornerstone of the building was laid in April of 1925. The new auditorium was completed and dedicated in 1936. The church gymnasium was a gathering place for neighborhood youth.
3 x 5 in.
